alert.note: Alert for Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:49PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dale County through 515 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Novosel, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Novosel, Ozark, Newton, Pinckard, Hunt Field, Waterford, Dean Church Road, Hooper Stage Field, Bagwells Crossroads, Lowe Army Heliport, Mabson, Ewell, Dale County Lake, Blackwell Field A/p, Hanchey Field and Klondyke Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
